ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: those who flounder in a glut of ignorance,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: who are steeped in ignorance and heedlessness.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: and who wander in the abyss of confusion.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Those who have forgotten in a state of intoxication.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Who are under a cover of Sahun,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Who are in a gulf (of ignorance) neglectful;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Who are careless in an abyss!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: who flounder in the depths of ignorance.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Those who are in heedlessness neglectful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: who are heedless in a stupor!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Those who (flounder) heedless in a flood of confusion:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Who are under a cover of heedlessness (think not about the gravity of the Hereafter),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: who are heedless in the immersion.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Those who are dazed in ignorance.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Who are within a flood [of confusion] and heedless.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [51:11] who are in a stupor, in ignorance that has stupefied them, heedless, oblivious of the matter of the Hereafter.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Who are careless) oblivious to believing in Muhammad (pbuh) and the Qur'an (in an abyss!) in ignorance and blindness concerning the Hereafter.
